EmailTemplate.name: CREDIT
EmailTemplate.subject: Your request to credit your account has been submitted
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for visiting Subscriber Services. Your request to credit your account for your missed paper has been submitted, and your carrier will be notified of this problem. If you have any questions, please call our Customer Service department at 215-222-2765
If your subscription package includes unlimited digital access, you can start browsing at inquirer.com or you can access The Inquirer and Daily News digital replicas available to you from anywhere at any time!
Have questions? We're here to help!
215-222-2765 | digitalsupport@inquirer.com
Monday- Friday: 6:30 a.m - 3:00 p.m.
Saturday-Sunday: 7:30 a.m. - 12:00 p.m.
You are receiving this email because you are a subscriber of The Philadelphia Inquirer Philadelphia Inquirer, 801 Market Street, Suite 300, Philadelphia, PA 19107 About Inquirer.com | Terms of Use and Privacy Policy | Copyright Â© The Philadelphia Inquirer LLC
